amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 163 which restricts funding for a light rail system in Houston, Texas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment that strikes Section 163 that prohibits the use of funds for a light rail system in Houston.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 222 (Roll no. 474).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 222 (Roll no. 474).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
